title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
Hi guys, 

Other motherboard with same s4 missing. 

HEre are my measurements.


 ppbus_g3h - 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER5V 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER3V3 12,,6V
PPDCIN_G3H 20V
PP3V42_G3H 3,45V
PPVRTC_G3H 3,3V

PP5V_S5 5V
PP5V_S4 0V, not shorted to ground Diode mode: 0,404 Resistnce to ground: 1,2 mhoms
PP3V3_S5 3,3V
PP3V3_S4 0V not shorted to ground Diode mode: 0,380 Resistance to roud 0,5mhoms

PP3V3_SUS 0V, not shorted Diode mode 0,342

ppbus_g3h - 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER5V 12,6V
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER3V3 12,,6V
PPDCIN_G3H 20V
PP3V42_G3H 3,45V
PPVRTC_G3H 3,3V

PP5V_S5 5V
PP5V_S4 0V, not shorted to ground Diode mode: 0,404 Resistnce to ground: 1,2 mhoms
PP3V3_S5 3,3V
PP3V3_S4 0V not shorted to ground Diode mode: 0,380 Resistance to roud 0,5mhoms

PP3V3_SUS 0V, not shorted Diode mode 0,342

PM_SLP_S5_L missing


Seems something usual for theese board to miss s4 reails. 

No water damge. 


Seems something usual for theese board to miss s4 reails. 

No water damge.

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
"PP3V3_SUS 0V"
Also missing PM_SLP_SUS_L?

Post SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L, S5_PWRGD, PM_DSW_PWRGD, PCH_DSWVRMEN and the 4 RTC signals.
Check if U1900 sends out 32KHz oscillation and PPVRTC_G3H.

Charging battery, magsafe light?

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
SMC_ADAPTER_EN 3.3V
PM_BATLOW_L 3.4V
PM_DSW_PWRGD 3.4V
PCH_DSWVRMEN  3.2V

Unfortunatly i dont have o-scope here..


For 4 rtc signals what u mean?

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
"For 4 rtc signals what u mean?"
U0500, page 12 (SYM 5 of 19).

"Unfortunatly i dont have o-scope here.."
Post DC value at least.
If you plan to stay in this business, get a cheap analog o-scope; should be good enough.

"Also missing PM_SLP_SUS_L?"
???

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
PM_SLP_SUS_L is missing, 0V

RTC_RESET_L  3.3V
PCH_INTRVRMEN - 3.2V
PCH_INTRUDER_L - 3V
PCH_SRTCRST_L  - 3.3 V

U1900 Pin 4 0,1V. 

WIll buy o-scope next week.

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
U1900 pin12; usually 0.45V DC when oscillation present.
However this will not confirm 100% good oscillation...

Your issue seems to be PCH related, as it doesn't release SLP_SUS.
Try to reflow it till 200 degrees.

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
Yeah, the f***g Intel MCP (MultiChipPackage)...
But heat the small area (PCH).

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
Dont get angry :) it's the small crystal part, am i right? 

thanks

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message: After reflaw no change. SUS_SLP stil missing. Think CPU is fucked

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message:
If all previous measurements are correct, PCH is bad.
Remember, there still exists a doubt about 32KHz for RTC block...
You can change U1900, just in case.

title: 820-3476-a missing s4 rails.
message: Yeah. I did it. Also bought o-scope and there is 32khz on pin 4, so defenitly  cpu is fucked. Thanks informaticos.
